Content.Text:
<NAME_MOB_EUGEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, I heard you've sold, what, 10,000,000G
worth of stuff? More than that?
<PAGE>
That's great. Always good to see younger folks
get ahead in life.

<NAME_MOB_EUGEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I hear you're raking in lots of cash these days.
Good for you!

<NAME_MOB_EUGEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Your store looks pretty busy. That's good. If
you've got any extra customers, send 'em my
way.

<NAME_MOB_EUGEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, nice selection you've got here. Let me
see...

<NAME_MOB_EUGEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, I'm happy. I found what I was looking for
and then some.

<NAME_MOB_EUGEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Glad I got a hold of this before it sold out. Good
times.

<NAME_MOB_EUGEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You know, I could afford this stuff, but I don't
think I really want to buy it right now.

<NAME_MOB_EUGEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I wanted to buy something, but...eh, not today.

<NAME_MOB_EUGEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I hope there's something worth buying here
today.

<NAME_MOB_EUGEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I hope it's worth my time coming in here...

<NAME_MOB_EUGEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, get out of my way.
